agent.name: Canonical Funnel Economy Agent
agent.description: Node-based agent bridging Storacha metadata, IPFS identifiers, and NFT leasing flows.

nftLeasing.description: Implements lease lifecycle orchestration and settlement hooks

instructions: Pin the agent metadata document to IPFS and store the resulting CID in CFE_IPFS_CID.
Publish the agent DID document and store the DID identifier in CFE_DID.
Run `npx cfe-cli register --manifest canonical-funnel-agent.json` to submit to the registry.
Attach NFT leasing policy references under src/services/nft-leasing.js before registration is finalized.
